channel.title: Protection from ddos?
channel.description: How can i protect my VPS from being ddosed? :( we just got ddosed but my vps host told me we have DDOS protection from cisco

item.title: Protection from ddos?
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

Team_Rocket:

The next time this occurs, you can check your live Network Status to see if It’s an actual attack. Contact your Service Provider and make them aware of the situation if this is the case. Disruption/Denial of your service is a crime; despite what some people may tell you.

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Protection from ddos?
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

Tree:

None of you know what the love you’re talking about.

Please, care to enlighten us on how to prevent ddos protection without purchase?

item.title: Protection from ddos?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:5, topic:477083”][quote author=owns reece link=topic=595276.msg4191623#msg4191623 date=1356893450]

prove to me it was a ddos attack
[/quote][quote author=Fridder link=topic=595276.msg4191589#msg4191589 date=1356891735]
Maybe you didn’t get ddosed and it was a glitch with the VPS or whatever.

The guy in-game was asking for max and insulting staff. So we iped him then he used a vpn and kept making new accounts he said he was gonna ddos us then we iped again then the vps was down for like 20 mins
[/quote]

pwnd[/quote]
loael

Idk ask David he pays top dollar for anti DDos

Read full topic

item.description:

[/quote][quote author=Fridder link=topic=595276.msg4191589#msg4191589 date=1356891735]
Maybe you didn’t get ddosed and it was a glitch with the VPS or whatever.
[/quote]

The guy in-game was asking for max and insulting staff. So we iped him then he used a vpn and kept making new accounts he said he was gonna ddos us then we iped again then the vps was down for like 20 mins[/quote]

It sounds like the kid was just trying to act cool over the internet.

item.title: Protection from ddos?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Yeah, it sure as Hell doesn’t come cheap, the community I’m with had to pay like 1,000 or something - it honestly isn’t cheap.

Read full topic

item.title: Protection from ddos?
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

VPS’s usually have little protection against DDoS attacks. You’d need to buy a server with actual DDoS protection, but you’re also going to need to cough up some serious money.

Read full topic

item.title: Protection from ddos?
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:8, topic:477083”][quote author=Christmas_tree link=topic=595276.msg4192801#msg4192801 date=1357070273]
How can you be certain it was a ddos attack? Under the assumption it was, it’s very difficult to filter. You’d have to buy protection
[/quote]Apparently his VPS has cisco, If you did actually get ddosed then the VPS company is probably lying[/quote]

Most probably. Who is the host?

Read full topic
